vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24;
mother of: Tebah (H2875), Gaham (H1514), Tahash (H8477) and Maacah (H4601)
§ Reumah = "elevated"
the concubine of Nahor, the brother of Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
流瑪 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "提高的"
亞伯拉罕的兄弟拿鶴的妾 (創 22:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
流玛 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "提高的"
亚伯拉罕的兄弟拿鹤的妾 (创 22:24)
